title: Hour 1- Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
itunes:title: Hour 1- Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Host
description:
Doug and TJ in for Dan.  They recap the weekend of NFL pre-season games and give their thoughts on how things went with Deshaun Watson and the Browns.  Former NFL Player and FSR Weekends host Geoff Schwartz joins the guys to talk about the Tom Brady hiatus, Lamar Jackson and other major NFL headlines coming off of the weekend.  TJ gives his forecast for his Bengals team this year. 

#DougGottliebShow #UpOnGame

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
